sense.def:
The smell of something
je značilnost nečesa, ki jo zaznamo z nosom.

seg.quote: The air had a sweet smell.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
smells
, ima značilnost, ki jo zaznamo z nosom.

seg.quote: Our kitchen smelt like a rubber factory.
The papers smelt musty and stale.

sense.def:
To smell something
pomeni prepoznati nekaj po vonju.

seg.quote: Don't strike a match if you smell gas.

sense.def:
To smell something
pomeni tudi približati nos nečemu in potegniti zrak vase, da bi ugotovili, kakšen vonj ima tisto.

seg.quote: She picked up the soap and smelled it.

sense.def:
Smell
je sposobnost človekovega nosu, da zaznava stvari.

seg.quote: They all have an excellent sense of smell.

sense.def:
To smell something
pomeni nagonsko čutiti, da se bo nekaj verjetno zgodilo, na primer, da se približuje nevarnost.

seg.quote: He's shrewd and can smell a successful project.

sense.def:
To smell a rat
pomeni začeti sumiti, da je nekaj narobe.
